name: Colossal Fighter/Assault Mode
text:
Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set.
This card cannot be Special Summoned except with "Assault Mode Activate".
When this card is Special Summoned, you can send up to 2 Warrior-Type monsters from your Deck to the Graveyard.
All monsters your opponent controls lose 100 ATK for every Warrior-Type monster in your Graveyard.
When this card on the field is destroyed, you can Special Summon 1 "Colossal Fighter" from your Graveyard.
